uncut.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a film, book etc that is uncut has not been made shorter, for example by having violent or sexual scenes removed
uncut.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: the uncut version of ‘Lady Chatterley’s Lover’
uncut.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: an uncut jewel that is still in its natural form has not been cut into a particular shape
